categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Imperial Remnant

nodes.text: Ansween was a commander in the Imperial Remnant serving under Grand Admiral Gilad Pellaeon as the commanding officer of the Star Destroyer Right to Rule during the Yuuzhan Vong War. At the Battle of Esfandia, Ansween served as something of an aide-de-camp to Pellaeon, while at the same time helping direct and coordinate orders between Imperial and Galactic Alliance forces.
